mapper.select: select u.id,u.merchant_id,u.enabled,u.type,u.username,u.password,u.phone,u.head_url,u.remark,u.`name`, r.id as rId,r.name,r.description from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on u.id= sur.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r on sur.sys_role_id=r.id where u.username= #{username} and u.is_delete = 0 and sur.is_delete = 0 and r.is_delete = 0

select u.id,u.merchant_id,u.enabled,u.type,u.username,u.password,u.phone,u.head_url,u.remark,u.`name`, r.id as rId,r.name,r.description from sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur on u.id= sur.sys_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role r on sur.sys_role_id=r.id where u.id = #{userId} and sur.is_delete = 0 and r.is_delete = 0
